smoothies.name: Strawberry
smoothies.desc: A classic blend of strawberries and bananas, with a splash of apple-strawberry juice.

smoothies.name: Lots of berries apparently. note: change this
smoothies.desc: Strawberries and bananas, with a refreshing scoop of orange sherbet and a mixed berry juice blend.

smoothies.name: Peach
smoothies.desc: A peach smoothie, with bananas, orange sherbet, and a delicious peach juice blend.

smoothies.name: Mango...Chili?
smoothies.desc: A popping mango smoothie with a spicy chili lime blend, sherbet with pineapple, and a passionfruit mango juice blend.

smoothies.name: Banana Berry
smoothies.desc: A banana berry smoothie, including bananas, blueberries, raspberry sherbet, and an apple-strawberry juice blend.

smoothies.name: Pineapple
smoothies.desc: A pineapple smoothie, with strawberries, bananas, and pineapple sherbet.
